arts.ttl: Brest predicted XI v OGC Nice: Radoslaw Majecki suspended, Mama Baldé out
arts.sum: Stade Brestois remain without AS Monaco loanee Radoslaw Majecki as they prepare to host OGC Nice on Saturday afternoon. The Polish shot-stopper was sent off during the defeat to RC…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Brest: Tiago Gouveai set for first start
arts.sum: OGC Nice will welcome back some key players for their visit to face Stade Brestois on Saturday afternoon. However, they will once again be without their club captain. Dante has…
